title: Woodland Lux is nice.
body: COME IN TO DROP OFF YOUR HELPFUL TIPS OR TAKE FROM THE BASKET AND GET FATTER, YOU LOOK THIN, Mr, Ms or Mrs noob (it just means new player). Yay! (2 Luxes). Posting this because que went from 30s-3min average to 10min+ then I stopped queing (unranked). Bejeweled gauntlets and ie are pretty. Berserker Ezreal, YAY, berserker Twitch YAY! Mao triggers off Zyra plants YAY! Aoe buffs Noct takes positioning. I love this mode, closest thing to 1vs1. Berserker, runaans, glacial Vayne with tier 1 ranger trait with enough tanks lost, 8th place????? The title is misleading because Lux isn't a must  (not all the time and I think they balanced the chance of Woodland Lux) :D Especially if people know how to spread out. Why isn't guinsoos Skarner with atk speed buff and etc turning into a super beyblade version of The Flash? What's the max atk speed please. Ludens Khazix :D Does anybody know whether mage Nasus = Ultra Nasus please????? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XwmuWalEKKc Hue mage Thresh. Runaans shojin old but gold. Static Kog (I didn't find it but I'm not really experimenting yet, just free flow so far). Do you eben bring lightning storms to matches >:o (bejeweled Singed + electric team) https://theplaylist.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/MaryAndTheWitchsFlower_-1200x520.jpg I'm not advertising, it just looked appropriate except I'm a dude but still. Oh, now it's appropriate, cinder Singed for the pureness, I'm not a pyromaniac. Does phantom dancer dodge crit casts please???? Ludens Voli = Pacman (by 1Park). I like ap Voli. Glacial Siv. Mage Yas????

replies.body: has anybody else seen a Braum shield an ally not behind his shield but 1 tile in front or Volibear/Reksai biting enemies more than 1 tile away (furthest I've seen so far is 4-6 tiles) after they've been cc'ed or the target got flung or etc away
Wtf are you even talking about?

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EHr9Zurb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-14T05:52:22.354+0000)
>
> Wtf are you even talking about?

op  shtuff that isn't op if you learn the counters, minus the weird bug/cheaty (shitty cheat-like stuff) stuff. Goodnight, I must go poop or fart

This mode has so much variety but feels like people are cheating sometimes, e.g ai keeps getting me 7-9  (not back to back but broken up only amongst specific people instead of random) times instead of me versing people who are in the lead  that I can counter but it's only happened 1-3 times out of 100 matches.
